name: Laser Ball (itch) (TheSyXan)
description:
What do you get when you take Pong and add in elements of Brick Breaker? The answer is Laser Ball! A fast-paced game where you protect your goal from an onslaught of balls. Use your powers to your advantage, extending your paddle, or shortening your opponent's paddle! Fire lasers that bounce the balls away from you! Can you defeat the computer opponent?

This is an old project that I decided to revisit. Upon looking at the code, I decided to rewrite most of it, which took something like ten hours over the course of two days. The old version had some code for a mobile version and a two-player side-by-side mode. If you like the idea of either of those ideas, let me know! As always, feedback and criticism is welcome.
